other_title: バトルスピリッツ烈火魂＜バーニングソウル＞ (Japanese)
plot: In the near future, a battle card game called "Battle Spirits" has gained enormous popularity. Players of the game -- known as "Battlers" -- start duelings everywhere using their color-coded cards with different attributes, creating a "Sengoku (Warring States) period" for the game.
